metadata.title: CVE-2018-1130 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Linux kernel before version 4.16-rc7 is vulnerable to a null pointerdereference in dccp_write_xmit() function in net/dccp/output.c in thatallows a local user to cause a denial of service by a number of certaincrafted system calls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-127-generic - 4.4.0-127.153
